translations: n.主人；硕士；大师赛（master 的复数形式）
v.掌握，精通（master 的三单形式）；控制

sentences.sentence: We are masters of our own destiny.
sentences.translation: 我们是自己命运的主人。

sentences.sentence: After all, The Masters is an invitational tournament.
sentences.translation: 毕竟，这项大师赛是一场邀请赛。

sentences.sentence: Masters sometimes allowed their slaves to buy their way out of bondage.
sentences.translation: 主人们有时候允许奴隶赎身。
